document_data.name: Pallar the Obedient
document_data.mainbody:
'''Pallar the Obedient''' was a [[human]] man of the city of [[Procampur]] in [[the Vast]].

He was a [[priest]] of [[Torm]] and was High Priest of the [[House of the Hand]] temple by [[1358 DR]], a position which he still held by [[1367 DR]]. He had 26 subpriests and 48 lay-worshipers.

Priests of Torm ran [[Calispar Delgorth]], a poison-dealing priest of [[Talona]], out of the city early in [[1367 DR|the Year of the Shield, 1367 DR]]. When Calispar later dealt with the [[Shadowkind]] [[assassin]]s in [[1369 DR|the Year of the Gauntlet, 1369 DR]], he asked them to assassinate the high priest.{{Cite dungeon/75/Into the Nest of Vipers|66}} <ref group="note">The high priest is unnamed but presumed to be Pallar the Obedient due to the close dates. As this is an adventure module and the attack is contingent upon a successful demonstration of Calispar's magic-resistant poison, which may be interrupted by player characters, the attack may not necessarily have gone ahead.
